label: 式部省試
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
見出し読み: しきぶのつかさのこころみ
見出し読み_mod: しきぶのつかさのこころみ
説明文: The second-level examination for students at the Academy.  It allowed the student to pass from gimonjō (provisional candidate) status to monjōshō (regular candidate).  See “foundation examination.”[擬文章生、文章生][RK]
